SIGN_IN_MSG: Sign in with your NICE credentials
SIGN_IN_ERROR: There was a problem signing in. Please try again.
CREATOR: Creator
NAME: Name
SELECT_REQUEST_TYPE: Select the type of request you wish (create, update or delete points).
ENTER_DESCRIPTION: Enter a general description of your request.
SELECT_DOMAIN: Select the target domain of the request.
SELECT_CATEGORIES:
Select the categories (one or more) of which the points in your request will be.
Note: you can always add new categories later.
SELECT_SUBSYSTEM: Type the system/subsystem to which this request relates.
SELECT_FILE_HELP:
Select the legacy MODESTI Excel file you wish to upload. Both .xls and .xlsx formats are supported. Max file size 10MB.

For TIM requests, versions greater than or equal to 4.0 are supported.
For CSAM requests, versions greater than or equal to 5.2 are supported.
For PVSS requests, versions greater than or equal to 1.1 are supported.
SPLIT_SELECTED_HELP:
You are about to split {{n}} points from your request. These points will be moved into a separate request.

Are you sure you want to do this?
REJECT_POINTS_HELP: You are about to reject {{n}} points. It is necessary to add a comment to each rejected point, specifying the reason for the rejection.
UNSUPPORTED_BROWSER_WARNING: You are using an unsupported browser. Some parts of this site will not work properly. Supported browsers are Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari and Internet Explorer (versions 10 and above). Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.
